amendatorysection.bookinfo: Uniform Commercial Code, Reissue Revised Statutes of Nebraska
amendatorysection.catchline: Timeliness of notification before disposition of collateral.
amendatorysection.para: (a) Except as otherwise provided in subsection (b), whether a notification is sent within a reasonable time is a question of fact.

(b) A notification of disposition sent after default and ten days or more before the earliest time of disposition set forth in the notification is sent within a reasonable time before the disposition.
